content: create your own classic hand-crocheted beach bag to carry all of your beach essentials in style the marina tote is worked from the bottom up using lion brand 24/7 cotton yarn in navy and ecru with size e 3 5mm crochet hook the bottom of the bag is then stitched together to give the bag its shape stylish grommets or eyelets as they are sometimes called and rustic rope handles are added to give the bag a professional look
